- Add tests.

body:
Prepare for connection.getSchema()/setSchema(schema) support. Verification on PostgreSQL/openGauss multi-schema, for scaling job.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Rename schemaName to databaseName in left code
- Rename schema to databaseName in ShardingSphereConnection; Add getSchema() in ShardingSphereConnection;

Almost replace all, the left ones really need schemaName, they almost co-exist with databaseName.
But seems IDEA could not search all source code, there's still left code not checked.
